text: Ah - how do you like discussions <@UDB26738Q>? I honestly have not tried them yet.

elements.text: Ah - how do you like discussions
? I honestly have not tried them yet.

text:
DexLang used them
I think they are a decent half-way house between issues and a forum like Discourse.
Perfect for DexLang which is too small to have a forum for.
idk if i would want them on a julia project when instead people can post on Discourse.

but like on DexLang i used them to ask things like how should i configure my text editor for Haskel (since DexLang is written in Haskell)
which would be not at all an OK issue, but seem fine as a discussion.
